title: Python for Beginners
description: This beginner-friendly Python course is designed to help you build a strong foundation in programming. Learn core concepts such as variables, data types, control structures, functions, and basic object-oriented programming. You'll also work with real-life examples and simple projects to gain hands-on experience. description: Kickstart your journey in web development with this comprehensive frontend course. Learn how to build responsive and interactive websites using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Dive deep into frameworks like Bootstrap and Tailwind CSS, and explore version control with Git. By the end of this course, you'll be able to create professional-looking websites from scratch and have a solid understanding of modern web development practices.
